name: m365-meeting-details-invitee-list
title: List meeting invitees for a meeting distinguishing internal and external invitees
shortDescription: Ask copilot to list the invitees for a meeting and distinguish between internal and external invitees
longDescription: This prompt will help you show the list of invitees for the meeting in a tabular format. It will show the name of the invitee, the organization name from the email domain, and user type, whether the user is internal or external.

thumbnails.alt: Prompt for Copilot for Microsoft 365 to list the invitees for a meeting and distinguish between internal and external invitees
